name: cohesion (blandmanstudios)
description:
A portal style puzzle game. 

Its all about joining together streams with oddly satisfying fluid simulation

Perfect your solutions into works of art or finish the game and play in the sandbox!

Created by a solo dev in < 48 hours

Game source code is available at:
https://gitlab.com/blandmanstudios/cohesion-game.git

Music is not mine - Used under CC-BY-3.0 from MEIZONG at https://soundcloud.com/dj-meizong/salt-mines
